name: SCANDALE CONSTRUCTION CO., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee

parties: SCANDALE CONSTRUCTION CO., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
JURISDICTIONAL REVIEW
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 14th day of October, 1999, probable jurisdiction is herewith noted and the appeal is quashed as untimely-
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
739 A.2d 131
SCANDALE CONSTRUCTION CO., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.
No. 202 M.D. 1999.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 14, 1999.
